display: PDF Conjurer (backend) | Start multi-column on PDF

AKS.caption: Multi Column Name
AKS.doc: This won't be shown in the pdf. This is only an internal reference so you type this same name when you want to insert elements inside this multi column. Tables, images and text are insertable. Note that inserted elements must be between the Start and End actions.
AKS.name: multi_column_name

AKU.caption: Insert the previous PDF Conjurer Server-side step result
AKU.name: config_info

AKX.caption: Being repeated
AKX.doc: If this column is being repeated inside a repeating structure, use "yes".
AKX.name: being_repeated

AKY.caption: Repeating structure name
AKY.doc: The name of the repeating structure this multi column is going to be repeated into.
AKY.name: repeating_structure_name
